ObjectCellValue
ObjectCellValue provides methods to use Object to set and get values of Cell
ObjectCellValue.DateTimeClass
Enum of usable classes to get date and/or date time values from Cell
ReplaceTextInRuns
ReplaceTextInRuns provides a replace method that can be used to replace one text with another, even if the text is broken into multiple pieces of text within the body paragraph.
